response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, but considering its potential impact on your endeavors, we believe it could be an invaluable asset for you. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price, reflecting our confidence in its worth and your ability to leverage its benefits. Our offer is as follows: $950,000. We understand that such a significant investment requires careful consideration, and we are here to answer any questions or provide further information to help you make an informed decision. We look forward to the possibility of partnering with you on this exciting journey.", "product_price": 950000}
